disorders.name: Anxiety Disorders
disorders.description: Disorders in which anxiety is a prominent feature.

disorders.name: Mood Disorders
disorders.description: Disorders characterized by a disturbance in mood.

disorders.name: Eating Disorders
disorders.description: Disorders in which an individual has a distorted body image and an abnormal relationship with food.

disorders.name: Personality Disorders
disorders.description: Disorders in which an individual has a distorted self-image and maladaptive patterns of behavior.

disorders.name: Substance Use Disorders
disorders.description: Disorders in which an individual has a problematic pattern of substance use.
